name: Hotel Hell (demo)
description:
When abandoned in a sketchy looking town, there’s only one thing going though your mind, find shelter. Luckily, Gordon Ramsay specialises in many things, including hotels, so he offers you a free stay at Hotel Hell for a bit while you get back on your feet. However… all does not seem to be right in Hotel Hell…

Embark on an amazing, never before seen (RenderPi please don’t sue us, we talked about this) adventure as you try to get by in Hotel Hell… without losing your head! Meet exhilarating characters along the way, such as:
Gordon Ramsay
Blippy the Clown
Big Birtha
Florin Salam
And many more!

(DOWNLOAD THE NEW VERSION BECUZ IT HAS A FEW CHANGES)

WEAR HEADPHONES!

RECOMMENDED VOLUME: 26/30

PLAY ON 1920X1080 PLZ TANKZ
